title: Designing Elementary Education Learning Material Delivery Using Mobile Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Elementary Education Curriculum and Experience with Mobile Devices
context.additional_context: Course where adult learners practice designing mobile-based learning materials for elementary education settings, structured as a short-term intensive program for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three principles for designing mobile learning materials.
Learners can develop customized mobile learning modules for elementary education curricula.
Learners can complete a prototype development project applying learning effectiveness evaluation criteria (average 80% or higher).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
